<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Broken Lands

</column>

Having once sampled Numerian fluids, you've tasted knowledge beyond comprehension. You are driven to recapture that astounding experience.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Constitution, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and the [Alchemical Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=752) skill feat.
